articles.author: Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: Macron wants to lead Europe on Ukraine, but France may not let him - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: French president faces blowback across the political spectrum for not ruling out a Western military presence in Ukraine.
articles.content: The question, then, is: How far is Macron truly ready to go this time? His previous lofty rhetoric on Ukraine, after all, has not been matched by action. Most significantly, can he hope to prevail as… [+1331 chars]

articles.title: Houthis Hit Underwater Communications Cables - SubTel Forum
articles.description: Houthi rebels have damaged four major submarine communication cables in the Red Sea, causing significant disruptions between Europe and Asia
articles.content:
